notes: Spacious and well-maintained luxury apartment with modern finishes including recessed lighting, polished tile floors, and quality built-in cabinetry. The open floor plan with kitchen island and large living/dining areas offers ample space for a family. For baby safety, the glass coffee tables have sharp corners and the open shelving may need childproofing; no visible stairs or concerning balcony railings in the photos. Good natural light from multiple windows.
